text: Martin Brambach (born 28 October 1967, in Dresden) is a German actor. He appeared in more than one hundred films since 1988. He played minor roles in the Academy Award-winning films The Lives of Others, The Counterfeiters and The Reader, and worked with internationally known directors like Michael Haneke and Thomas Vinterberg. Brambach lives in Recklinghausen with actress Christine Sommer, and their daughters and son.Martin Brambach bei stimme.de == Filmography == *1993: Das Geheimnis ....
